name: NO_SUCH_OBJECT
text: No object found for the provided ID.

name: NO_SUCH_FIELD
text: Given field doesn't exist on the CRUD Model.

name: NO_ID_PROVIDED
text: ID necessary for operation not provided.

name: INVALID_LIST_FILTER
text: The provided list filter contained non-existent fields, values not matching the field type or requested partial matches for full match only types.

name: ALREADY_DONE
text: The action you attempted to perform can only be done once and was already performed before.
